channel.title: Liminal - 1970 - Oxford (March)
channel.description:
**= = Liminal - 1970 - Oxford = =**
System : Liminal Genre : Modern Urban Fantasy Supernatural
Central England, After 2 World Wars, Before the Internet!
Characters exist between the Mundane regular world, and the world of the Supernatural - Vampires, Ghost Realms, Werewolves, Fey Zones
* The game will be recorded on Youtube. * THE X-CARD will also be in use. * Will be multiple sessions, will try to weave in ongoing/non-ongoing stories in fun ways.
* https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MQ-JiqkcfsKzjD3dsSC * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MQ-JzwZxecVg6CKvSm7 * https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MQ-KFcU6OMmGAR_CNXM
